Class CurrencyConverter

java.lang.Object
CurrencyConverter
public class CurrencyConverter extends Object
Provides JUnit tests to test functionality of classes and methods. Note: The exchange rate for USD to EUR was last updated 13:25 CST on 9/29/2023. This class offers methods to convert amounts from USD to EUR and to calculate the change to be given in EUR based on item price and amount paid.

    • usdBillsToAmount

      public static BigDecimal usdBillsToAmount(int[] bills)
      Converts a given array of USD bills to its equivalent value in EUR.
      Parameters:
      bills - An array representing the numbers of each USD bill denomination.
      Returns:
      The total amount in USD.

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      bills - An array representing the number of each USD bill denomination.
      Returns:
      The converted amount in EUR.

    • calculateChange

      public static int[] calculateChange(BigDecimal itemPriceEur, BigDecimal cashPaidEur)
      Calculates the change to be given in EUR based on item price and amount paid. This method determines the number of each EUR bill and coin denomination to be given as change. If the amount paid is less than the item price, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      itemPriceEur - The price of the item in EUR.
      cashPaidEur - The amount paid in EUR.
      Returns:
      An array representing the number of each EUR bill and coin denomination to be given as change.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if cashPaidEur is less than itemPriceEur or if itemPriceEur is negative.
